metadata.description: Unique name of the Dynamics 365 CRM environment.

body.ap_caseappeal_transcription_errors: Exceeded max number of call retries. To retry again, manually set transciption status to Retry

body.ap_casedecision_transcription_errors: Exceeded max number of call retries. To retry again, manually set transciption status to Retry

body.ap_courthearing_transcription_errors: Exceeded max number of call retries. To retry again, manually set transciption status to Retry

queries.$filter: ap_courthearing_transcription_status eq 683710002 or ap_casedecision_transcription_status eq 683710002 or ap_caseappeal_transcription_status eq 683710002
